class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.  This course meets during the first half of the semester. Prerequisite: EPI 530 or 504
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 504, or EPI 530.  To provide training in the domestic and international public health aspects of tuberculosis; its epidemiology and diagnosis, the theory and practice of treatment, and means of prevention in developed and developing countries; and the interaction between HIV and tuberculosis.  Cross-listed with GH 562.
sections: Class Nbr: 4654, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
